complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Remove BLE Dependencies and Clean Legacy Code
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down this cleanup task into systematic removal steps: 1) Remove BLE package dependencies, 2) Clean BLE imports and code from all tab1.page.ts files, 3) Remove GlucoseReading interface and BLE-specific types, 4) Update routing to use feature modules instead of legacy tabs, 5) Remove legacy tab1/tab2/tab3 modules completely
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium-high complexity due to extensive BLE code throughout multiple files (5+ pages with duplicate implementations), routing changes needed, package.json modifications, and potential breaking changes. Requires careful removal to avoid breaking the app structure.
